content: 9st turn 10dc row2 ch1 decrease 1dc in next 6 decrease turn 8sts row3 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 1dc in next 7 turn 8dc row4 ch1 decrease 1dc in next 4 decrease turn 6sts row5 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 1dc in next 5 turn 6dc row6 ch1 decrease 1dc in next 2 decrease turn 4sts row7 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 1dc in next 3 turn 4dc row8 ch1 decrease twice turn 2sts row9 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 ch2 1dc in last st fasten_off with back of hat facing you count 21 26 28 29 sts away from first st of earflap rejoin yarn and repeat as for first earflap dont fasten_off at end of earflap work 1dc in each st around hat and earflaps putting 3dc in the ch2 of earflaps fasten_off weave in all ends ties cut a long piece of yarn fold in half using a 5 5mm hook pull through the ch2 space on earflaps and chain between 30-40 chs fasten_off add pom pom thank you for downloading this pattern please do not sell this pattern or claim this to be your own pattern you may make and sell the finished item i hope you enjoy making this design thanks michelle x
